MainArmor._COMMENT: What areas of the body do you want to protect?

HeadAreas._COMMENT: What head areas do you want to protect?

Resources._COMMENT: Repair Cost, Item Durability, and Cost of Item from Ragman

GodMode._COMMENT: Enable this to disable penetration of armor. (i.e., 0 throughput)

Blacklist._COMMENT: Set to true to remove chance of pmc bots spawning with this item in their inventory.
